title: Did not receive a response from server..
body: The website says that the game is up... I've been playing all day.. My client crashed within the last 30 minutes after my last game (It's 1:30 EST here). What is going on? Is the game down?

replies.body:
There was a service incident last night that lasted for a bit before it was resolved very early this morning. If you're still running into issues, please let me know and we can work together to resolve it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
LoL NA is currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
